function.name: humidity_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the humidity level of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the humidity level.

ration.description: The percentage value to increase the humidity by.

humidityDelta.description: The amount by which to increase the humidity.
